alert.note: Alert for Imperial Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 09 at 10:03PM PDT until May 10 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Imperial Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects will become airborne. Moderate tree and minor structural damage possible.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.
